item.title: Everyone Is Capable of Mathematical Thinking—Yes, Even You
item.description: Mathematician David Bessis claims that mathematical thinking isn’t what you think it is, and that everyone can benefit from doing more of it.

item.title: Nike Promo Code: Extra 25% Off Select Styles
item.description: Check out our deals for Nike this month, including an additional 25% off with our coupon code.

item.title: Korg MicroKorg 2 Review: Better, Not Best
item.description: This tiny synth is a solid upgrade, but it lives in a sea of excellent competitors.

item.title: Skip the Viral Hatch Restore 2 for This Brighter, Cheaper Clock
item.description: After testing many, many sunrise alarm clocks, I recommend the Lumie Bodyclock Shine 300 for your perpetually sleepy loved one.

item.title: Asus Vivobook S 14 OLED Review: A Simple and Effective Laptop
item.description: It’s not flashy, but this Asus laptop has all the power you probably need plus a crisp OLED display.
